code_blocks.code:
import Rhino
import scriptcontext
import rhinoscriptsyntax as rs

def DoSomething():
    
    msg = "Select surfaces, polysurfaces and meshes to outline"
    obj_ids = rs.GetObjects(msg, 8+16+32, True, True, True)
    if not obj_ids: return
    
    rc = rs.Command("_MeshOutline", False)
    if not rc: return
    
    outline_ids = rs.LastCreatedObjects(True)
    print "{} outlines created".format(outline_ids.Count)
    
DoSomething()
